name: Western Town survival game
description:
A simple project I worked on. 

Just collect the 13 wanted cubes, and don't die. 

The map is fairly large and features a day-night cycle.

Made in UE4

Controls:

WASD - Move

Right mouse - Aim, Left mouse - Shoot

C (tap) - switch camera shoulder, C (hold) - switch 1st/3rd person

X - Ragdoll

Z - Slowmo

Performance:

On my GTX 970 I'm between 50-70 fps

Also the game has a simple options menu that should hopefully work

FPS is shown in the bottom left
